com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class HtmlIconUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.HtmlIconUtil

  • public final class HtmlIconUtil
extends Object
    Provides helpers to attach icons to components.
    Since:
    1.2.1
    Author:
    Mark Reeves

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HtmlIconUtil.IconPosition
      Provides access to position icons in components.

    • Method Detail

      • getIconClasses

        public static String getIconClasses(String icon)
        Pass in a string HTML class name and get the correct WComponents icon HTML classes.
        Parameters:
        icon - the icon-specific HTML className
        Returns:
        a HTML className string.

      • getIconClasses

        public static String getIconClasses(String icon,
                    HtmlIconUtil.IconPosition position)
        Parameters:
        icon - the HTML className representing an icon
        position - where the icon should go in relation to the content of the component
        Returns:
        a HTML className String which will set up a component to contain an icon in the desired position.
